description: Completion of online modules/Moodle revision quizzes before tutorials, participation in discussions, and study of set readings. Marks based on pre-work completion.
Multiple-choice test during examination period covering lectures, tutorials, readings, and specific online modules. Assesses understanding of core course concepts.
10-minute group oral presentation on allocated tutorial reading with peer partner. Focuses on communicating clinical psychology concepts.
Individual take-home task with 1000-word written answers to psychopathology questions. Submitted via Moodle/Turnitin and emailed to tutor.
